data.message: Eminem I would like to meet you one day...If 2Pac was here he would definitely be right in the studio with you...you have nearly 100 million likes on Facebook...one day you should just sit back and look at all that you went through in your life and wonder if things wouldve been different had you did something else. You are one of the greatest rappers of all time. I knew the man they called 2Pac...he would've been proud of you...I hope to see you one day...and I will be getting an Eminem tattoo...this is your legacy we're all living it.
